UnitInfo.Civilopedia: "Embers are small, insignificant fire elementals. They can be lured easily using steady trickles of mana and careful Adepts can feed them for days. Their fickle nature makes them harder to command, though, thus it is advisable to take full of their usefulness before they run amok."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Elements: the Essentials
UnitInfo.Strategy: Use Embers's mobility to harass enemy cities and units, suicide them to powerful units and cause damage as much as you can.
